abstract: Toyota expands Takata-made airbag recall, saying it will replace airbag inflaters in 1.6 million Japanese vehicles it had earlier deemed safe.
lead_paragraph: The decision to replace inflaters in Takata airbags previously judged to be safe adds 1.6 million vehicles to the world’s biggest auto safety recall.

headline.main: Toyota Expands Airbag Recall in Japan
headline.print_headline: Toyota Expands Airbag Recall in Japan by 1.6 Million

snippet: The decision to replace inflaters in Takata airbags previously judged to be safe adds 1.6 million vehicles to the world’s biggest auto safety recall.
